metadata.name: Microsoft IIS Service Account Password Dumped
metadata.comment: Detects the Internet Information Services (IIS) command-line tool, AppCmd, being used to list passwords

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\appcmd.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('appcmd.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('list ')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /config')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /xml')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -config')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -xml')) OR (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /@t')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /text')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /show')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -@t')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -text')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -show'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':*')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('password')))))

output.summary: Detects the Internet Information Services (IIS) command-line tool, AppCmd, being used to list passwords
